definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Finally, cognitive dissonance shows up with children.
sentences.chinese: 最後，孩子身上也有認知失調。

sentences.english: The question becomes how well you can manage this cognitive dissonance.
sentences.chinese: 問題是你能把這種認知失調處理得有多好。

sentences.english: This has caused some cognitive dissonance.
sentences.chinese: 這種數據與事實相悖的情況引起了一些人的認知失調。

sentences.english: Whether that’s true or not, that’s cognitive dissonance in action.
sentences.chinese: 不管那是對或錯，都是認知失調在作怪。
